=Following features are available in Twitter Portlet.=


  * FriendsTime Line(Tweets) at home page.
  * Tweet facility with tweet button at home page(only 140 characters    are allowed in tweet).
  * Reply to a tweet.
  * Delete a tweet.
  * Sign In as a different user.
  * Followers List with count.
  * We can follow/Unfollow our followers.
  * Friends List(accounts which the logged in user is following) with count.
  * We can Unfollow our friends.
  * List of My Tweets.
  * List of Retweets By me.
  * List of @ mentions.
  * List of Twitter Trends.
